name: CABIN
shortDescription: The CABIN sits at the back of the yard.

name: YARD
shortDescription: The large YARD is behind me.
extendedDescription: The large YARD sits in front of the cabin, with the two large trees arching before the cabin entrance.

name: DOOR
shortDescription: The creaky cabin DOOR is in front of me.
extendedDescription: The cabin DOOR is the last thing my parents installed. I am not sure if it was to facilitate going in and out throughout the construction process, or if it symbolized closure of a long and tiresome process.

name: CABIN DOOR
shortDescription: The CABIN DOOR shut behind you, chief. Now it won't budge
extendedDescription:
Help me go back outside.
<start_sound_color>CLANK CLANK<stop_sound_color>
<start_grendar_color>The door won't budge chief.<stop_grendar_color>
Pfff, we shall find another way then.

name: ORANGE DOOR
shortDescription: The ORANGE DOOR is orange, chief!

name: BLUE DOOR
shortDescription: The BLUE DOOR is in the far back of the room.
useitemText:
OOOH! This house isn't only kitchen! Not that Grendar didn't like that! He he!
Wanna go see what's in the room chief?

name: BLUE DOOR
shortDescription: The BLUE DOOR is still behind you.
extendedDescription: The BLUE DOOR must be still open, leading to the LODGE.

name: ORANGE DOOR
shortDescription: The ORANGE DOOR is somewhere near the entance.
extendedDescription: Grendar's voice pierces my ears, although he is so far, pinpointing the location of the door.

name: VINES
extendedDescription: <start_grendar_color>These VINES are so thick even Grendar cannot go through them!<stop_color>

name: BLUE DOOR
shortDescription: The BLUE DOOR is still behind you.
extendedDescription: The BLUE DOOR must be still open, leading to the LODGE.

name: BLUE DOOR
shortDescription: The BLUE DOOR is back where I came from.
extendedDescription: The BLUE DOOR must be still open behind me, leading to the BEDROOM.

name: ORANGE DOOR
shortDescription: The ORANGE DOOR must be somewhere above me.
extendedDescription: I don't even know where the ORANGE DOOR might be, after this massive fall.

name: ORANGE DOOR
shortDescription: The ORANGE DOOR is right above me.
extendedDescription: I can reach it now that I see.

name: RED DOOR
extendedDescription: The inner part of the RED DOOR is severly scratched, from what seems to be... human nails?
